title: Dia smurf playing ranked solo tonight from bronze - gold LF KARMA/THRESH supports to spam
body: Dia smurf playing ranked solo tonight from bronze - gold LF KARMA/THRESH supports to spam, if u main supp and can play thresh and karma will duo with u the whole way lets go

replies.body: Im a platinum support main in plat at the moment would love to duo if you have time, ign is hoeleecritz

you might want to add a threshold for the thresh or karma support mains, because you'll probably get a few thirsty bronzies who haven't played thresh or karma before and just want you to boost them. Probably want to make the threshold (bad pun) mastery lvl6 or something, because bad threshs/karmas might make it harder for you to climb.

Anyways goodluck and I hope you get someone deserving out of elohell and have great fun.
